overview:
Jordi has been involved in internet technologies and new ventures since 1999, but heâ€™s the first to admit that Amuso is his most fun endeavor yet. Ignoring his true calling as a Moto GP racer, he founded newHabitat.com, one of Spainâ€™s leading real estate portals and BNT Solutions which provides e-business consulting services to start-ups. He also managed product development at Yahoo! Prior to launching his career on the web, Jordi was an electronics engineer focused on R&D for the medical laboratory equipment industry.

Jordi has an Electronics Engineering degree, a BSc in Computer Science, a Masterâ€™s degree in IT Management and an MBA from London Business School.
